task.title: Syntax Highlight Not Available in Eclipse Plugin

context.p: I associated the .ext extension with in Eclipse. Why does an .ext file opened with the plugin not have syntax highlight?
Associating an extension with in Eclipse versions requires three steps:

step.cmd: Associate the .ext extension with the plugin.

substep.cmd: and go to General Editors File Associations .
Add *.ext to the list of file types.
Select *.ext in the list by clicking it.
Add to the list of Associated editors and make it the default editor.

step.cmd: Associate the .ext extension with the Oxygen XML content type.

substep.cmd: and go to General Content Types .

Add *.ext to the File associations list for the Text XML
content type.

step.cmd: Press the OK button in the Eclipse preferences dialog box.

taskbody.result: Now when an *.ext file is opened the icon of the editor and the syntax highlight should be the same as for XML files opened with the plugin.
